resources.string: This is the Add Event Page
The event that was clicked is passed as a parameter to this activity. The Event Name is:

Default Text: When working with time-related data, it\'s also important to consider how you will store and retrieve the data from your data source (e.g., database, network, etc.). You may need to convert the time values to a format suitable for storage and retrieval, such as Unix timestamps or ISO 8601 formatted strings.

This app needs location permission to function. You can grant them in app settings. Go to Permissions -> Location -> Allow.
